labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: the clickable area brings you to a settings view with only the social media icons
data.expected_result: there is no small clickable area
data.short_description: at the bottom of the right click menu on client settings there is a small clickable area that opens the social media buttons
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the small sliver of clickable area at the bottom -
